Defining the anatomy and nature of the pontine lesion requires high-resolution MRI; evidence of dissemination in space and time plus CSF oligoclonal bands would support multiple sclerosis, while vascular imaging, audiology, and basic blood tests help distinguish stroke, tumour, and inflammatory or metabolic mimics and assess treatment fitness.
